DataElement.preferredName: Grade 2 Platelets Chimeric Antigen Receptor T-cells Administration Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether the participant achieved blood count recovery of platelets to less than or equal to grade 2 within 6 weeks of CAR-T cell administration.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Grade 2 Platelets, CTCAE Chimeric Antigen Receptor T-cells Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: <75,000 - 50,000/mm(3); <75.0 - 50.0 x 10e9 /L:Autologous or allogeneic T-lymphocytes that are engineered to contain a chimeric antigen receptor (CAR) that specifically targets a particular antigen._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.
